name: Salamangreat Coyote
desc:
During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there as Link Material this turn: You can activate 1 of the following effects.
● Target 1 "Salamangreat" monster in your GY, except "Salamangreat Coyote"; Special Summon it in Defense Position.
● Target 1 "Salamangreat" card in your GY, except "Salamangreat Coyote"; add it to your hand.
You can only use this effect of "Salamangreat Coyote" once per turn.
